title: Breakingviews TV: New Cuba boss
text:
Breakingviews TV: New Cuba boss 1:14pm EDT - 04:23 
Raul Castro, 86, has stepped down as president in a bid to prolong the Cuban revolution. The creaking economy will make that hard, but radical change is unlikely. Martin Langfield explains why new boss Miguel Diaz-Canel, 57, may at least initially be much like the old boss. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Raul Castro, 86, has stepped down as president in a bid to prolong the Cuban revolution. The creaking economy will make that hard, but radical change is unlikely. Martin Langfield explains why new boss Miguel Diaz-Canel, 57, may at least initially be much like the old boss.
